context.name: Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope
context.excerpt: High performance meets economy. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced riflescopes.
context.content:
High performance meets economy. Clear, tough, and bright, the popular Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope is built to exceed the performance standards of similarly-priced riflescopes.

Long eye relief, a fast-focus eyepiece, fully multi-coated lenses, and resettable MOA turrets are hallmarks of the series.

 

 

Vortex Crossfire II 3-9X40 Dead Hold Rifle Scope Specifications:

Magnification 3-9x
Objective Lens Diameter 40 mm
Eye Relief 3.8 inches
Field of View 34.1-12.6 ft/100 yds
Tube Size 1 inch
Turret Style Capped
Adjustment Graduation 1/4 MOA
Travel Per Rotation 15 MOA
Max Elevation Adjustment 60 MOA
Max Windage Adjustment 60 MOA
Parallax Setting 100 yards
Length 12 inches
Weight 15 oz
